Articles.Content:
No i can not take the risk even though i just saw the finale

press to become a character in game of thrones butt there is a 60% chance that you're not from the book

Press. I always liked the show more anyway.

Press the button to be Mar's One's chosen astronaut.

Nope, i like earth better.

Press the button nobody knows what it is for. (could be anything even Earth self destruct sequence)

Yes. Screw this Universe. Hopefully that button will create a new one. It sure as hell can't make my life much worse.

Pressing the button will transfer all the money from Bill Gates' bank account to yours. The button is near a bunch of wasp nests and you have to throw rocks at them before you are allowed to press it. On top of the button is a large, scary, poisonous spider. His poison is enough to paralyze you so if you get bitten, you will slowly die from wasp stings.

*DIED TRYING*

Pressing this button will have a miniscule(5%) chance you will get whatever you want, FOREVER. On the other hand(95% chance), you will hear a screamer so loud you can no longer hear; then the button disappears. You'd have to be CRAZY to want to press it.

What are you people saying? Can't hear a thing.

Pressing the button will make poor people rich but ugly and rich people poor but beautiful.

Nah.

Pressing the butting will either kill you(60%) or make you immortal(40%)

I'm the button and can't press myself even if i (would/)have the will to

~*censored*% won't give me some hands, the others ~*censored*% will even give me a kick in addition

I do not press it.

Pressing the button will make the devs give you 24. But skydoesminecraft will join the ksp community and call rocket fuel butter juice...

press it i can live with butter juice

press the button to let KSP become a game more famous and well known than minecraft but EA will buy Steam

press it i can live with butter juice

press the button to let KSP become a game more famous and well known than minecraft but EA will buy Steam

Never

Will you press the button to become tony stark but the mercer virus becomes real.

Edited June 12, 2014 by Brethern

Press it! Why not!

If you press the button you will be reborn into a peaceful extraterrestrial civilization..

Edited June 12, 2014 by Dooz

cool, pressed...

Press the button for a free punch into the face.

no

press the button to be an SCV in starcraft, watch this video for inspiration

Nah

Press the button to become a cake.

You aint eating me son!

Press button to becaume an Astronaut! On a oneway trip

Negative

Press the button to become a parasitic brain worm.

Why not. Keji Infanue, you're going to paay!

Press this button for another button.

Presses http://inception.davepedu.com/

Press this button to become a spider queen.

NO.

Press button to become rich, famous and be 20 years old again, unless you are already younger than that. Die at 25.

http://inception.davepedu.com/

This was hilarious to see while listening to "Dear Mama".

Nah.

Press this button to make Danny2462 release a dozen, wacky KSP shorts.

There is supposed to be a downside, you know...

Pressing this button will give Danny2462 control over the real world, however you alone will be immune to it.

no

press to see the future but there is a 70% chance that it is an apocalyptic future

HELL YEAH! I'll pack my stuff and press it.

90% chance you'll never encounter lag or OOM crashes in KSP again, 10% chance that you'll never be able to use mods again or have more than 50 parts in physics range.

Nope

Press this button to open a trap door under you falling into infinity.
